channel.title: NameQuick Updates
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 1.9.27
item.description:
NameQuick v1.9.27

Pro Tip

ðŸ’¡ Speed up file processing: Deactivate meta description generation in settings when not needed. This can significantly reduce processing time and token usage, especially for large batches of files. Only enable it when you specifically need detailed metadata extraction.

Whatâ€™s Fixed

No More Repeated Permission Prompts

Finally fixed that annoying issue where macOS kept asking for keychain permission every 15-30 minutes! NameQuick now runs quietly in the background without interrupting your workflow.

Whatâ€™s New

BYOK Token Usage Dashboard

Track your API token consumption and costs with a new comprehensive dashboard for Bring Your Own Keys users: â€¢ Real-time token usage tracking across OpenAI, Gemini, and Ollama â€¢ Detailed cost breakdowns by model and operation type â€¢ Historical usage charts with daily/weekly/monthly views â€¢ Export usage data for expense tracking

Enhanced AI Model Support

â€¢ Added 5 new Gemini models including stable 2.5 Pro and Flash versions â€¢ Expanded Gemini catalog from 8 to 13 models total â€¢ Better model recommendations based on file type and tier preference

Whatâ€™s Improved

Better BYOK Experience

â€¢ Real-time token usage tracking with accurate cost estimates â€¢ Enhanced API key validation that works on all network conditions â€¢ Redesigned model selector interfaces for OpenAI and Gemini â€¢ Automatic model filtering based on API key availability

Faster & More Reliable

â€¢ 2-3x faster batch processing with parallel operations â€¢ Smarter retry logic that handles API limits gracefully â€¢ Reduced token usage through automatic image compression â€¢ Better performance when switching between apps

Smoother User Experience

â€¢ Improved transformation editor with better placeholder handling â€¢ Enhanced pattern testing with real-time preview â€¢ Clearer error messages that tell you exactly what to do â€¢ More responsive interface with streamlined window management
